feature.label: NetzDatenStrom BDA Feature
feature.description: This feature bundles all plug-ins that are needed for the use cases of the module named "middle voltage data recorder (MVRec)" of the research project NetzDatenStrom (NDS). (1) read IEC 60870-5-104 telegrams from a Pcap file, (2) change the timestamp of the first telegram, (3) change the timestamp of all other telegrams accordingly, and (4) send changed telegrams as IEC 60870-5-104, using the timespam between timestamps of two subsequent telegrams as waiting time between sending the telegrams.
